options.text: This solution installs the Awake Security CEF connector which allows users to send detection model matches from the Awake Security Platform to Microsoft Sentinel. The connector also enables the creation of network security-focused custom alerts, incidents, workbooks, and notebooks that align with your existing security operations workflows. After installing the solution, configure and enable this data connector by following guidance in Manage solution view.
